chapter.title: Hold Signoff
chapter.p: Create a 'Hold signoff' transition for customers and allow them to enter feedback using the card 'Murmurs'.

topic.title: Creating and using customer only transitions

steps.item: Create a transition which can be used only by customers. Set the transition to move a card from 'Ready for Showcase' back to 'Ready for Development'. Set the transition to require a murmur.
When the customer uses the transition the customer can use the murmur to explain the change that needs to be made and why the card needs more development.
